Rules:
CREATEDATE IS NOT NULL
STATUS = 'NEW'

SUBMITTEDDATE IS NOT NULL 
STATUS = 'SUBMITTED'
APPLICATION_RECEIVED_DATE IS NOT NULL

APPLICATION_RECEIVED_DATE IS NOT NULL
FCBC_PROCESS_COMPLETE_DATE IS NOT NULL
APPLICATION_ACCEPTED_DATE IS NOT NULL
APPLICATION_REJECTED_DATE IS NOT NULL

ADJUDICATION_DATE IS NOT NULL
APPLICATION_ACCEPTED_DATE IS NOT NULL
ADJUDICATION_DATE < = ACCEPTED_DATE
AUTHORIZATION_STATUS_CODE =  '2'
ATHN_CLOSE_REASON_CODE = '3' OR '81'
(STATUS  = 'CLOSE'
CLOSE_REASON = 'Abandoned by client' OR 'Cancelled by client')

ADJUDICATION_DATE IS NOT NULL
ACCEPTED_DATE IS NULL
AUTHORIZATION_STATUS_CODE =  '2'
ATHN_CLOSE_REASON_CODE = '3' OR '81'
(STATUS  = 'CLOSE'
CLOSE_REASON = 'Abandoned by client' OR 'Cancelled by client')

APPLICATION_ACCEPTED_DATE IS NOT NULL
STATUS = 'ACCEPTED'
FIRST_NATION_START_DATE IS NOT NULL

FIRST_NATION_START_DATE IS NOT NULL
FIRST_NATION_COMPLETION_DATE IS NOT NULL
LANDS_STATUS_DAT IS NOT NULL
REPORTED_DAT IS NOT NULL

ADJUDICATED_DAT IS NOT NULL,
CODE_CHR_STATUS = 'AL' or CODE_CHR_STATUS = 'OF'

ADJUDICATED_DAT IS NOT NULL
DISALLOWED_DAT IS NOT NULL 
CODE_CHR_STATUS = 'DI'

OFFERED_DAT IS NOT NULL
CODE_CHR_STATUS = 'OF'

OFFER_NOT_ACCEPTED_DAT IS NOT NULL
CODE_CHR_STATUS = 'ON'

COMMENCEMENT_DAT IS NOT NULL AND
CODE_CHR_STATUS = 'GS'

APPLICATION_RECEIVED_DATE IS NOT NULL
 ON_HOLD_START_DATE>=APPLICATION_RECEIVED_DATE
APPLICATION_ACCEPTED_DATE IS NULL

APPLICATION_RECEIVED_DATE IS NOT NULL
APPLICATION_ACCEPTED_DATE IS NOT NULL
FCBC_COMPLETED_DATE IS NOT NULL
ON_HOLD_START_DATE>=FCBC_COMPLETED_DATE 
REPORTED_DAT IS NULL

APPLICATION_RECEIVED_DATE IS NOT NULL
APPLICATION_ACCEPTED_DATE IS NOT NULL
ON_HOLD_START_DATE>=APPLICATION_ACCEPTED_DATE 
REPORTED_DAT IS NULL

APPLICATION_RECEIVED_DATE IS NOT NULL
APPLICATION_ACCEPTED_DATE IS NOT NULL
REPORTED_DAT IS NOT NULL
ON_HOLD_START_DATE>=REPORTED_DAT
ADJUDICATED_DAT IS NULL

APPLICATION_RECEIVED_DATE IS NOT NULL
 ON_HOLD_END_DATE>=APPLICATION_RECEIVED_DATE
APPLICATION_ACCEPTED_DATE IS NULL

APPLICATION_RECEIVED_DATE IS NOT NULL
 ON_HOLD_START_DATE>=APPLICATION_RECEIVED_DATE
APPLICATION_ACCEPTED_DATE IS NOT NULL
ON_HOLD_END_DATE<=APPLICATION_ACCEPTED_DATE

APPLICATION_RECEIVED_DATE IS NOT NULL
APPLICATION_ACCEPTED_DATE IS NOT NULL
FCBC_COMPLETED_DATE IS NOT NULL
ON_HOLD_START_DATE>=APPLICATION_ACCEPTED_DATE ON_HOLD_END_DATE<=FCBC_COMPLETED_DATE

APPLICATION_RECEIVED_DATE IS NOT NULL
APPLICATION_ACCEPTED_DATE IS NOT NULL
FCBC_COMPLETED_DATE IS NOT NULL
ON_HOLD_START_DATE>=APPLICATION_ACCEPTED_DATE 
REPORTED_DAT IS NULL

APPLICATION_RECEIVED_DATE IS NOT NULL
APPLICATION_ACCEPTED_DATE IS NOT NULL
FCBC_COMPLETED_DATE IS NOT NULL
REPORTED_DAT IS NOT NULL
ON_HOLD_START_DATE>=APPLICATION_ACCEPTED_DATE 
ON_HOLD_END_DATE<=REPORTED_DAT

APPLICATION_RECEIVED_DATE IS NOT NULL
APPLICATION_ACCEPTED_DATE IS NOT NULL
REPORTED_DAT IS NOT NULL
ON_HOLD_START_DATE>=REPORTED_DAT
ADJUDICATED_DAT IS NULL

APPLICATION_RECEIVED_DATE IS NOT NULL
APPLICATION_ACCEPTED_DATE IS NOT NULL
REPORTED_DAT IS NOT NULL

ON_HOLD_START_DATE>=REPORTED_DAT
ON_HOLD_END_DATE<=ADJUDICATION_DAT

CANCELLED_DATE IS NOT NULL
ACCEPTED_DATE IS NOT NULL

EXPIRY_DAT IS NULL

ACCEPTED_DATE IS NOT NULL
REPORTED_DAT IS NOT NULL

CODE_CHR_STATUS = 'CA'
EXPIRY_DAT IS NULL
